title: SAMPLE_1_CD4
extract_protocol_ch1: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMC) were extracted using Ficoll-Paque (GE Healthcare) gradient centrifugation. CD8 T-cells and CD4 T-cells were extracted from PBMCs by consecutive positive separation using microbeads (CD4+ #130-045-101; CD8+ #130-045-201) and AutoMACS technology (Miltenyi Biotec) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was isolated from the purified cell pellets using the QIAmp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite using the EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research Corporation) according to the manufacturer’s instructions
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450 Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

CD8 T-cells and CD4 T-cells were extracted from PBMCs by consecutive positive separation using microbeads (CD4+ #130-045-101; CD8+ #130-045-201) and AutoMACS technology (Miltenyi Biotec) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was isolated from the purified cell pellets using the QIAmp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite using the EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research Corporation) according to the manufacturer’s instructions
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450 Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

extract_protocol_ch1: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMC) were extracted using Ficoll-Paque (GE Healthcare) gradient centrifugation. CD8 T-cells and CD4 T-cells were extracted from PBMCs by consecutive positive separation using microbeads (CD4+ #130-045-101; CD8+ #130-045-201) and AutoMACS technology (Miltenyi Biotec) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was isolated from the purified cell pellets using the QIAmp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite using the EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research Corporation) according to the manufacturer’s instructions
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450 Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

extract_protocol_ch1: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMC) were extracted using Ficoll-Paque (GE Healthcare) gradient centrifugation. CD8 T-cells and CD4 T-cells were extracted from PBMCs by consecutive positive separation using microbeads (CD4+ #130-045-101; CD8+ #130-045-201) and AutoMACS technology (Miltenyi Biotec) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was isolated from the purified cell pellets using the QIAmp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite using the EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research Corporation) according to the manufacturer’s instructions
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450 Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

extract_protocol_ch1: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMC) were extracted using Ficoll-Paque (GE Healthcare) gradient centrifugation. CD8 T-cells and CD4 T-cells were extracted from PBMCs by consecutive positive separation using microbeads (CD4+ #130-045-101; CD8+ #130-045-201) and AutoMACS technology (Miltenyi Biotec) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was isolated from the purified cell pellets using the QIAmp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite using the EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research Corporation) according to the manufacturer’s instructions
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450 Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

extract_protocol_ch1: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMC) were extracted using Ficoll-Paque (GE Healthcare) gradient centrifugation. CD8 T-cells and CD4 T-cells were extracted from PBMCs by consecutive positive separation using microbeads (CD4+ #130-045-101; CD8+ #130-045-201) and AutoMACS technology (Miltenyi Biotec) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was isolated from the purified cell pellets using the QIAmp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite using the EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research Corporation) according to the manufacturer’s instructions
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450 Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta

extract_protocol_ch1: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMC) were extracted using Ficoll-Paque (GE Healthcare) gradient centrifugation. CD8 T-cells and CD4 T-cells were extracted from PBMCs by consecutive positive separation using microbeads (CD4+ #130-045-101; CD8+ #130-045-201) and AutoMACS technology (Miltenyi Biotec) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was isolated from the purified cell pellets using the QIAmp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's protocol. Genomic DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite using the EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research Corporation) according to the manufacturer’s instructions
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450 Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Arrays were imaged using Illumina HiScan scanner using standard recommended Illumina scanner setting      HiScan v.3& Illumina AutoLoader2X v. 2.3.0.0
data_processing: Bioconductor package’s minfi option ‘Raw’ pre-processing was used to convert the intensities from the red and the green channels from the original IDAT ﬁles extracted from the HiScanSQ scanner into methylated and unmethylated signals. Beta values were computed using Illumina’s formula [beta = M/(M+U+100)] and normalized using method SWAN as implemented in minfi. Detection p-values were obtained for every CpG probe in each sample using detectionP option in minfi. Samples with detection p-value > 0.01 in more than 10% of the CpG sites and possibly contaminated or mixed up samples (determined using the 65 SNPs present on the methylation beadchip) were discarded. All the probe sequences were mapped to the human genome (build hg19) and all probes that did not map uniquely, mapped to CpG sites with SNPs up to 3 bp upstream of the site, or mapped to the X/Y chromosomes were discarded.
data_processing.1: The 'MatrixSignalIntensities.csv' contains unmethylated and methylated signal intensities
data_processing.2: The 'MatrixProcessed.csv' file contains SWAN normalized Average Beta
